author: markekraus
body:
@daxian-dbw :
> We need to figure out what to do with the powershell package about this limitation on macOS.
CoreCLR has explicitly moved away from OpenSSL on mac, see this PR: dotnet/corefx#17011.
Please open an issue to track the macOS packaging about this.

re #5629 #5590

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: one of these was supposed to be about addressing the packaging related issues, and the other was supposed to be for the fact that this is needed at all.

title: macOS Packaging and libcurl+openssl+gssapi
